item.description:
Please join us for the next Meet-Up in Lewiston! There will be a powerpoint presentation on animal welfare issues in the state, including ways to get involved, current legislation and time for questions and answers. you can also see the beautiful, new Greater Androscoggin Humane Society. Anyone with an interest in and passion for animals and their welfare should attend. Please feel free to contact me with questions.

See you there!
Katie L.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the training room, directly to the right of the entrance
item.why: Learn about current animal welfare issues, legislation, and great ways to speak up for animals.

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Lewiston Animal Welfare Meet-Up
